Keep in Touch!

If the things I’m working on are interesting for you, please feel free to reach out at any time - you can stay up to date via RSS or email. For RSS, use your reader to search for “The Perpetual Apprentice.” For email, fill out the signup form below. I look forward to hearing from you soon!
